name: form-address-autocomplete
description: Address form with autocomplete suggestions and map preview placeholder
postMessage:
Address Autocomplete installed!
Import: import { AddressAutocomplete } from '@/components/form-address-autocomplete/address-autocomplete'
Usage: <AddressAutocomplete onAddressChange={(addr) => console.log(addr)} />
Replace fetchSuggestions prop with your API (Google Places, Mapbox, etc.)
